No scratches on the camera, no visible signs of dropping it.  But the fact that it's busted apparently means I dropped it.  The whole camera costs $100 and they want $107 to fix it.Do your self a favor, don't mess with Nikon or their customer service, or their cameras!  Go with Cannon.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money !
Reviews.Author: brittnny9
Reviews.Content: I own an amazing Nikon camera for professional photography, I purchased this item because I wanted something light weight for vacation. I was shocked at how horrible this camera was. My flip phone from 2005 could take better pictures than this. It was absolute trash I returned it immediately. Disgrace for a Nikon product

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My wife lost her camera, so I bought her this one as a replacement.  She's taken it on several trips and brought back some nice photos.  It has lots of features (which were attractive to me) and it's simple to use (which is attractive to her) so we're both pretty happy.  One thing to note is that this does NOT come with an SD card, so the camera itself only holds a few pictures unless you purchase separately and install a card.

Reviews.Title: Over priced by supplier and does not give an accurate power level of the battery.
Reviews.Author: Terrance Ramsaran
Reviews.Content: It was over priced by the supplier and does not give an accurate power level of the battery while in use.

Reviews.Title: VERY PLEASED
Reviews.Author: Ed Spangler
Reviews.Content: Excellent Value!,This camera takes great Pics and is  easy to learn to operate, We are VERY PLEASED with this camera and would highly recommend it to users like us who are "Seasoned" folk and not comfortable with trying to learn complicated technology., Thank You!!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX 3500
Reviews.Author: J. Manges
Reviews.Content: A really great camera.  Smaller than what I am use to but I will adjust.  Fits in my purse without taking up a lot of room.  Takes really great pictures.  I especially like the zoom feature, don't know how I lived without it!

Reviews.Title: very nice
Reviews.Author: mimz
Reviews.Content: It take a while to get used to using it but it didn't take long for me to be able to get the settings correct and take great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat disappointed.
Reviews.Author: sara nash
Reviews.Content: Dosnt have as great quality when you zoom as expected. It should be better based on mega pixels and optical zoom.

Reviews.Title: nice color and compact
Reviews.Author: kizzy lee
Reviews.Content: Nice camera. Arrived just in time for my cruise. I just can not figure out how to transfer my pictures onto my computer using the usb cable. I installed the disc that came with the camera and still no luck.

Reviews.Title: Cute  real camera for  kids
Reviews.Author: DCSD
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10 yr old granddaughters (twins). Two colors. They were thrilled. Learned to work them in minutes. Easy. Lots of info included.

Reviews.Title: nice little camera
Reviews.Author: kenneth bates
Reviews.Content: It's a nice little camera but I can figure out how to get my picture printed.  I have to go back and review the cd and hope to be able to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera but has Charging Issues.
Reviews.Author: Mike Dwyer
Reviews.Content: When the battery is exhausted you need to make sure the little charging green light is lit.  If you just plug in the charger when the exhausted screen is "on" the camera will NOT be charging.  After charge, if the camera doesn't turn "on" then pop the battery out and put it back in, this will hard reset the camera.  Very poor charging design.

Reviews.Title: Wanted a purple camera
Reviews.Author: Sheron R Wimberley
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera. It came in time for my trip and it was easy to work with and a good price. Would purchase from the company if I need to get another

Reviews.Title: Thank you!
Reviews.Author: Kbutland
Reviews.Content: The camera was sent quickly and it was great that a case came with it. I used this camera for my honeymoon in Hawaii, and I was able to get great pictures! The zoom is awesome, and the picture quality is superb.

Reviews.Title: < 6 months later shutter won't open fully
Reviews.Author: weblady
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for a wedding gift for our daughter,(December 2013) it worked great at first but when we tried to use it for graduation it displays like the shutter isn't fully open and this is pretty useless. We only had a 30 day return from Amazon. I have read many complaints along the same lines on Google-let the buyer beware folks...

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 7x Zoom (Purple)
Reviews.Author: Ronald L. Plummer
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 7x Zoom (Purple) is a excellent camera for the price, easy to use, and is stylish.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: shawn armstrong
Reviews.Content: perfect works great beautiful lovely great just right great pictures and records great lovely perfect. so much just right fit.

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Susan D. Angelo
Reviews.Content: Great little camera. It takes great pictures and is so convent to take along. My six year old grand-daughter wanted a camera. Always using a Nikon I naturally wanted to get her a nikon. This one is a great size for her and takes nice pictures and videos. She can keep it in a little bag and take it everywhere. It's also light weight for little ones. I also borrow it for times I don't want to carry a larger camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera perfect price
Reviews.Author: d.glass
Reviews.Content: Such a great camera and the price is perfect.  The images are crisp and clear, many on screen options and still very easy to use. My 9 year old has figured out how to different effects on her own.

Reviews.Title: My 2nd Coolpix camera
Reviews.Author: sharon
Reviews.Content: Dropped the first one after a good 10 years of faithful service  ))-:  what a great little camera!  I'm always getting compliments on photographs.  Really love the internal rechargeable battery with USB/AC plugs for charging.  Real easy software to get photos onto computer and share them.  I'd buy another one...hopefully this one will last 10 years or more.  Love the wide angle lens!

Reviews.Title: My third CoolPix and love it!
Reviews.Author: LJ
Reviews.Content: I have purchased this camera three times now. Unfortunately I've broken the first two because I hike a lot and they get dropped or broken in other ways. Still, the camera takes a licking and continues to work until it's ultimate demise. I like it because it's small and can slip into a pocket easily. The difference now is that I put in in a case before putting it in my pocket!I have upgraded as I've purchased them with the last one going from the 5X zoom to 7X. It takes great photos for a small point-and-shoot camera and it's easy to learn to use too.Highly recommend if you want simplicity and great photos.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Camera
Reviews.Author: Deb-Ohio
Reviews.Content: Was not realy excited about the quality.  Crossing my fingers it lasts for at least a year.  Bought it as a gift for my daughter-in-law.  Was supposed to come with a leather case which it did not. She hasn't said if she has had time to use it yet and how it works.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Tanya Smith
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure which camera to purchase, after reading the reviews I decided to get this one.  It takes very good pictures, I have cropped and enlarged them and am very pleased with the results.  I am still learning which is best settings for zooming in.  Some of them the camera is slow to reset between pics.  That is the only flaw I have found in this product.

Reviews.Title: Cool pix is cool
Reviews.Author: Rita K. Bourhenne "cat lover"
Reviews.Content: Like it a lot.  Easy to use.  Takes good pics.  I'm satisfied and I like it better than my last camera

Reviews.Title: Got 3 weeks use out of it before the lens got stuck
Reviews.Author: Momma-of-4
Reviews.Content: After reading all the good reviews, I thought this would be a great camera.  I did read some reviews where some people mentioned the lens getting stuck on their cameras, but since the good reviews outweighed the bad, I thought the odds of that happening to me were pretty slim.  Well, the odds were against me and now I have a camera with a "lens error."  I've tried everything to my knowledge to try to get it to work again and nothing has worked.  So, I'm sending it back.  Thankfully, I got most, if not all my pictures off of it before this error occurred - at least I hope I did.  Since the camera won't even turn on now, I have no way to tell for sure.  I thought Nikon was much better than this - it's a simple point and shoot camera - how can they mess that up?  Now, to look for a new camera ..... again.

Reviews.Title: Crisp pics
Reviews.Author: Marga R.
Reviews.Content: I needed a camera so that I can feel safe taking pictures without worrying about dropping my phoneor having it stolen or just getting it wet. At least with a camera, you still get the images without the added risks.For something that I didn’t consider to be of much consequence though, this baby actually surprised me. It won’t give you the same features that you get from big, bulky professional cameras, but the pictures are clear and crisp.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP digital Camera
Reviews.Author: nancy taber
Reviews.Content: I bought the camera to take on a recent trip to Israel and it more than met my expectations. It is so compact and easy to use.I love it.

Reviews.Title: takes good pictures but i preferred my older coolpix
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: The pictures come out well and my husband was impressed with it's stability when zoomed in but I found the time between photos a bit slow and it doesn't seem as user friendly as my old coolpix. Overall, for the price it wasn't a bad buy and I like how small and compact it is and the color choice was nice as well.

Reviews.Title: far superior to same camera 5 years ago
Reviews.Author: Cherie C. Binns MSCN
Reviews.Content: After a little more than five years of toting my cockpit around in my purse, the shutter failed.  This is same size,more pixels, longer zoom and takes great action shots as well as stills.  I love the compact quality this gives.

Reviews.Title: Great camera even new photographers
Reviews.Author: L. Neyens
Reviews.Content: The Nikon Coolpix is easy to operate, and creates beautiful photographs.  I bought this for my 15 y/o grand-daughter and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Took great pictures but stopped working after 6 months
Reviews.Author: TammyC117
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after my daughter was born so I could take pictures of her. It took great pictures and the colors were very bright and vivid. The shutter speed was quick and I was really happy with the purchase. I used to have the Nikon D3100 SLR and it was a great camera so for a regular point and shoot I went with Nikon. Unfortunately when I went to go turn my camera on the other day, it wouldn't work. I thought it might have been dead but I put it on the charger and it still won't work. I was really look forward to using it this summer but it looks like I'll be buying a new camera now. I love Nikons DSLR cameras but I will not be buying any of their point and shoot cameras again. Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: sahil manchanda
Reviews.Content: I bought it almost a month ago, right now things are looking pretty good. I like it! Nice camera with nice look.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Meg
Reviews.Content: Broke within the first hour:( my daughter was very excited to get this... Now just sad. I had to find something else to get her for birthday because the cheap camera thing is nerve racking.

Reviews.Title: lens cover won't open after 5 uses
Reviews.Author: Leon A. Koyama "rail commuter"
Reviews.Content: The first time I put the camera to everyday use it failed. The lens cover only opens about a quarter of the way. Luckily I had a back up (my old Samsung). I am returning this puppy today!

Reviews.Title: Easy to use...great photos!!!
Reviews.Author: Richard Lewis
Reviews.Content: Very compact and lightweight.  I needed this to photograph my artwork for print conversion...works great and was a  good price too!!!

Reviews.Title: Broke after 8 months
Reviews.Author: Byron-Bergen Public Library
Reviews.Content: I got this and loved it but it won't take clear pictures and the screen looks pink.  I have not sent it out yet to see if they will stand by their product but very disappointed that I have to.

Reviews.Title: Love the color!
Reviews.Author: Margaret Baker
Reviews.Content: Takes good pictures. Is small enough for my purse.The color is so great and makes it attractive to see.

Reviews.Title: Received it recently.
Reviews.Author: Brittany Hinkley
Reviews.Content: I have not had the camera long enough to say I love it. I love how easy it is to navigate and all of the options but I have not had the chance to use it for what it was bought for. It is small and fits well into a pocket and the lens is well protected. If the pictures come out well it will be perfect.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Wilian Fernando Duarte
Reviews.Content: it was a gift to my father! he is taking good pictures, i recommend this camera! cheap, nice pictures and very small.

Reviews.Title: Small / Easy / High Quality
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: This camera is small enough to fit in your pocket.  Straight out of the box, it is easy to charge and use.  Generates high resolution photos.  Great for travel.  Very versatile.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Cynthia D. Crabtree
Reviews.Content: I've only had the camera for a couple of weeks and used it a few times but it is pretty great.  It is small and handy to just carry in my purse all of the time.  I have the Nikon Coolpix P80, which is a larger camera and is difficult to carry with you all the time or comfortably to the beach, but this smaller Nikon is great for everyday and beach vacation shots.  I'm excited to use it there.  The pictures look great and the ease of use is pretty good too.  I have not read the instructions yet but was able to just point and shoot and get great shots already.

Reviews.Title: Don't do it!
Reviews.Author: Karen Phillips
Reviews.Content: I wish I had listened to the reviews.  Blurry pictures and a very very slow reaction time out of the camera was what I got.  I have four children, and by the time the camera actually took the picture, the kids would be long gone.  I returned it after about 20 min of fiddling with it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Jane E Griffith
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great compact size, quality of the pictures is awesome, video is good and battery life is great.For the price this is a great camera!  I have a Cannon that was $400 and has all the bells and whistles and doesn't take as good of pictures as this does!  Compact, 7x zoom, unbeatable MPs for the price!  Highly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great camera ... loved it
Reviews.Author: NIRAV PATEL
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect to carry in pocket. Its small in size and takes great quality pictures compare to its size and cost.

Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera!  I have been delighted with the quality of photos that it takes.  The zoom is quite good. It was a great deal for the money.

Reviews.Content: Bought this before our second trip to Disney last month. Compact and took amazing pictures. I would highly recommend this!

Reviews.Title: Excellent

Reviews.Title: Cute, Compact, Great Quality Camera
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a compact camera to be able to easily carry with me that also took good quality photos. It is cute, compact, and does take great pictures! I can't wait to capture memories of my son with this camera!

I cannot say enough good things about it.

Reviews.Title: ok

Reviews.Title: Love this camera.

Reviews.Content: First of all because it's purple, it's size is perfect slides right into my pocket, it is light and takes great pictures. Perfect for my needs and easy to use.

Reviews.Content: i love and am very happy with my purchase, esp because it was the cheapest rate i found and came with a free card. The camera has exceeded my expectations. The best feature it has that its able to take pictures in motion with out the picture being blurry. And the auto is awesome. Ive used it in many settings, and its always produced great shots.

Reviews.Content: I got this camera because I had a baby and wanted to be able to take pictures with something other than my tablet. It's not anything fancy, but it's just perfect for what I need.

Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to take on a trip so I didn't want to spend alot as I am prone to dropping and/or losing things on trips.  I love the size of this camera and it takes nice pictures.  The one thing I didn't like was the speed at which it turns on and off.  I would recommend the leather digital camera case with this and it fits very nicely.

Reviews.Title: great birthday gift
Reviews.Author: KATHLEEN S. ANDERSON
Reviews.Content: Got this for my sweet daughter-in-law for her birthday.  Of course her favorite color is purple and this made her smile.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Raman "amazon fan"
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price and Nikons reliability. I am happy with this purchase. Just a quick and easy camery to carry

Reviews.Title: love it

Reviews.Content: I have a camera like this, and I love it, got it as a giftso Isent it one to my friendshe loves it

Reviews.Title: Flimsy, cheap product
Reviews.Author: soleil
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera because I went with all the positive reviews on Amazon (those with 4 and 5 stars).  I received my camera today, March 10, 2014.  Size wise, the camera is great.  However, the buttons that allow one to customize the camera did not work.  The "ok" button which you need to set up the camera and use the menu would not respond to my touch.  I ended up skipping the time/date set-up once the "ok" button responded.  I then took one picture and the camera stopped working.  I am highly disappointed with the product.  I was hoping to use the camera abroad in a couple of days and instead will be shipping it back for a refund tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: Nothing better than the images i got off my old cell
Reviews.Author: AllTheWayMae24
Reviews.Content: I returned it, the color was cute, I loved the fact that there was a pet option in the settings, but ultimately it was a bigger pain in the a$$ than it was worth, was told a certain setting would make my images appear less blurry. Couldn't find the setting. Maybe i got used to pressing a screen and not a button but honestly almost 85% of the photos I took came out very blurry both in light and in the dark. Will wait til I have $300 for a good camera, until then subpar old cell phone camera is fine.

Reviews.Title: Rating of my new Nikon COOLPIX S3500 digital camera
Reviews.Author: Jean Wissman
Reviews.Content: I love the camera.  My only complaint is that the battery did not last long at all.  It takes great pictures and is very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix

Reviews.Content: this camera works really well , it's quite basic and good.No complains about it , what you see is what you get .

Reviews.Title: Just ok

Reviews.Content: This is a nice product for the price-- but it changed the colors on my pictures as well as not taking the picture as quickly as I had hoped.  I returned it.

Reviews.Title: What a camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara A. Harris-para "CFII"
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures, lightweight, zoom is great  Lots of features on this camera that we didn't have int he last one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Mary Kirkland "I saw a woman wearing a sweat ...
Reviews.Content: I bought this hoping for clear pictures than my old camera that didn't have a flash and this is a wonderful camera that takes clear, great pictures. I can not get over the great picture quality I am getting from this camera. A friend of mine told me about this camera when she found out I was looking for a new camera and she was right to recommend this one. For the price I could not be happier. I sat across the living room and took a picture of my small bear statue sitting on the tv, using the zoom feature and it came out so clear like I was standing right in front of it. I'm very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Small size, great value!
Reviews.Author: John Paul's wife
Reviews.Content: This little camera fits in my purse, was a great price, and takes great pictures. I would recommend it for traveling or any other occasion you need a better picture than you can get on your cell phone.

Reviews.Title: nice camera

Reviews.Title: Great deal!

Reviews.Title: I bought this for my wife

Reviews.Title: Photo's

Reviews.Content: Photo's aren't as crisp as I thought they would be, for the 20.1 MP.  Handy to fit in pocket, easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera...

Reviews.Content: Nice camera, pretty color, takes nice pictures. I personally have not figured it all out yet, but overall, I'm happy with this purchase. Fast shipper. Would buy fom again.

Reviews.Title: Works better than expected

Reviews.Content: Very awesome cameramy whole family was impressed with this little sleek camera and it was easy to get around compared to some of the cameras i have seen. the battery came halfway charged which was pretty awesome and came with a little wrist strap.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera before from another site, but had to re-buy it from amazon when it broke (it was my fault it broke, I dropped like the genius I am). The 20MP pictures are gorgeous, the 7X zoom is great, very easy to use. Can't beat the quality for the price.I did a little research before I re-bought it, this is the highest rated camera for the price range, Nikon has always been a great brand, and the camera itself is adorable, I get a lot of compliments on it.

Reviews.Title: fragile camera not well built. avoid it.
Reviews.Author: li shen
Reviews.Content: The camera is too fragile.  One drop on the floor and it's damage. They should make camera more damage proof.

Reviews.Title: Great "starter" camera
Reviews.Author: JR
Reviews.Content: My oldest loves taking photographs and while I love much of what she captures, at 8 years old I get a bit twitchy with her using our DSLR. Went searching around for something that looked basic but had some fun functions without too many bells and whistles. This would be it. Could not be happier with this purchase - quality and value.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted
Reviews.Author: Dylan Lasher
Reviews.Content: This camera was everything someone could want in a camera. It has a considerably simple user interface, with a plethora of dynamic features to put quality into images being taken.

Reviews.Title: Small pocket camera
Reviews.Author: M. Dunn
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera because I needed something small enough to fit in my pocket for travel.  Versatile ~ like the zoom capability.  A bit slower than I would like in-between pictures.  I have a Canon Rebel for better shots but it's a bit large to travel with.

Reviews.Title: No HDSC?
Reviews.Author: Jim Hall
Reviews.Content: Will not accept HDSC card. Have to use lesser capacity SC card. Will not even take pictures if HD card is in place.

Reviews.Title: NIKON COOLPIX s3500
Reviews.Author: Noona Stone
Reviews.Content: It is a fun little camera with lots of easy to learn options. It produces wonderful photos in many light conditions and i do like the zoom. I do recommend this camera. it is very compact and light, fits in my shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: Do not like this camera.  Was terribly disappointed with the quality of pictures it takes.  I would not recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Garfy63
Reviews.Content: Had been given a different Nikon for Christmas it hd been refurbushed was a piece of crap so kinda stayed away from Nikon but this one is wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Incredible Camera!
Reviews.Author: Rev. Norris
Reviews.Content: Small, light, and takes INCREDIBLE pictures.  The 20+ megapixels let us blow up photos and still have great resolution!  The built in effects are cool.  This camera has more bells and whistles than I can imagine ever needing.  I like the Nikon COOLPIX S3500 so much that I bought one for my wife... and she loves hers!  (I got some MAJOR brownie points!)

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent camera!
Reviews.Author: Odyn
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera (two of them for our daughters for Christmas).  Although our daughters are still very young,  two months later, they have not put these cameras down; they love it!  They cameras have fallen a few times and I am happy to say, the cameras are pretty durable also.  The pictures and videos are very clear and the camera itself is very easy to operate, even the special effects.  I was also surprised at the length (amount of time) allowed for recording one video is eight minutes!  These cameras are small, sleek, light and pretty; they fit just about anywhere.  The only issue I have was that these cameras were advertised to come with a usb 16 gb memory stick/chip each and they did not contain these chips; we had to purchase the memory chips separately.  These cameras do need extra memory and constant recharging, otherwise, great camera, especially for the price.

Reviews.Title: Cheap / Good looking with poor quality
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: 1. good looking.2. cheap.that's all pros.cons:1. slow2. assemble not very good.not an exciting product.

Reviews.Content: nikon has the best camera's out there..............and good reason for it, great quality, last forever, and good pricing.......i enjoy these little point and shoot camera's for going on trips when you don't want a bulky camera to carry around

Reviews.Content: I don't get the hype around this camera. Close-ups are blurry, Motion is blurry, and pictures in the dark...forget about it. It's an okay camera, but trying to capture that moment in a picture is not happening, I'm currently looking for better cameras, maybe I just need to pay a little more than what this one cost.

Reviews.Title: good buy

Reviews.Content: Bought this for our daughter for Christmas present.  She seems to like it.  The only thing she dislikes is the time of wait between taking pictures is frustrating.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera

Reviews.Content: We love these cameras. When not in use, store them in a jewelry bag since they are very sensitive to getting "stuff" in the lens and they refuse to open or close. Great pictures, super easy to use. Hope this one stays with us loner than the last one that was stolen.

Reviews.Content: This camera is small and compact and very light weight.  I bought it to take with me on a disney half marathon and I really shouldn't have wasted the space.  In the dark it takes the most awful, dark, grainy pictures.  They all came out blurry, grainy, and unusable.  I didn't expect a miracle.  It is after all tiny but unless there is TONS and TONS of daylight (like bright sunny day...not even overcast) you photos are not going to turn out very well.  I wouldn't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: cute
Reviews.Author: No John Henry
Reviews.Content: This is my first digital camera.  I put off buying one because they seemed too complicated, but my old film camera broke and could not be repaired.  I read reviews and decided on this one for its ease of use.  I made a good choice.  With only a few fumblings I was able to take pictures right away, and I have been snapping away ever since.  It really is a cute camera and fun to play with.  Now I wonder why I didn't go digital years ago.

Reviews.Title: Gift

Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my 10 year old daughter who loves to take pictures of random objects. Shipping is always more than acceptable through amazon. The camera itself is adequate for its purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great Camrera

Reviews.Content: Camera takes great pictures, really great,Only problem I had was USB cable was bad, order new one (for about $15) and now connects and charges correctly.Still was a good price

Reviews.Title: Great camera for a great price
Reviews.Author: brilynn24
Reviews.Content: Good quality camera, light weight. Pictures look professionally done. Camera has a lot of good features, including face and smile recognition.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures

Reviews.Content: I bought this for my teen daughter for Christmas, because you know, one can never have enough pictures of themselves.  Anyway, she loves it.  Takes clear, crisp pictures and is easy to operate.

The quality of the photos are fantastic especially for someone who is not a photographer.  I upload the card to mpix and they are at more door in no time.  Great deal cant beat the 70 somethinkg buks I paid for this camera.

Reviews.Title: great camera

Reviews.Content: I love this camera, but I wish the battery indicator was more clear. I love the size. i can put it in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: great camera

I CHARGED THE BATTERY AND PUT THE FREE SANDISK MEMORY CARD IN PRIOR TO GIVING IT TO HER.  I DID NOT TAKE ANY PICTURES WITH IT BUT MY GRANDDAUGHTER LOVED IT.  I HAVE A DIFFERENT MODEL NIKON CAMERA AND IT TAKES VERY GOOD PICTURES. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA TO POTENTIAL CUSTOMERS.

Reviews.Title: Too slow.
Reviews.Author: Alan3354
Reviews.Content: You have to wait several seconds between shots.  I tried a Class 10, 45 MBaud SD card, and it did not help.I plan to return it, get something with reasonable write speed.

Reviews.Title: Cool color
Reviews.Author: C. Edwards
Reviews.Content: works as described. No issues yet but we've only had it a week. Really easy to start up / set up.

Reviews.Title: LED display is too noise
Reviews.Author: theertendra
Reviews.Content: LED display is too noisy, and claity is not good for a 20 Mega pixel camera. I've returned the Camera.

Reviews.Title: Love it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Content: It's just  perfect. Quality of image incredible, is really small what it makes it very practical and confortable. Totally recommended it!! Besides, excellent price!

Reviews.Title: Not easy to use
Reviews.Author: EGBMiller
Reviews.Content: Not as easy to use as I had hoped.  Semi auto focus is difficult to get right with a target in motion and makes taking high quality quick photos an accident rather than a plan

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: James A Shehorn
Reviews.Content: It is a perfect color.  The camera works very well.  The price was a great price! I would recommend anyone to buy it.

Reviews.Title: ALMOST PERFECT...BUT LACKING MULTIPLE-SHOTS SELF-TIMER--IS THE DOWNER!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Grey"
Reviews.Content: I would have loved to keep this camera but as I found out, there was no multiple-shots self-timer. I thrived with my ancient Canon and its multiple-shots when it comes to frequent situations when it's only you and your spouse taking selfies together. Even with more than two people, taking pictures with everyone in it is a must especially if the distance of the camera to the point of focus needs a 500-meter dash or one must wade through precarious elements before the camera clicks. A multiple-shot self-timer  had helped captured PRECIOUS moments where otherwise a one-shot timer wouldn't. I tried this Nikon coolpix and I love the quality photos but when you're in the middle of Biltmore estate in an 18-degree weather,  running back and forth to your tripod to set the timer with each shot is not an option I'd like to take, I ended up taking very few shots because I was freezing to death and ultimately decided I must let go of this very nice camera because it's also about memories and multiple-shots. I'm keeping my Canon in the meantime, until I can find a better option with the much-needed feature.

Reviews.Title: Great everyday camera!
Reviews.Author: ally
Reviews.Content: I needed an easy to use camera that wasn't over-priced and this was perfect! The fact that it takes amazingly clear photos and has all the little extras that a lot of the "better" cameras don't makes this a bargain. I highly recommend this for the 99% of us who don't need a $600 camera,but want better quality photos than what our phones can do.

Reviews.Title: That's a lot of pixels!
Reviews.Author: etkpdx
Reviews.Content: I got it for my upcoming Kilimanjaro trip, because I stopped using my bulky camera years ago.  I had it up on the mountain, and used the digital zoom to take a picture of a group quite aways from me.  Then I uploaded it to the computer, and could zoom in to get portraits of some of the people.  I had no idea you could get this much in such a small package.I got it in orange for those summit group shots when we all hand our cameras to a total stranger.  I'll be able to quickly identify mine.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S3500 Camera
Reviews.Author: South Florida
Reviews.Content: This is a very easy camera to operate.  It truly has a "brain" of its own.  It makes excellent picture for an item under $100.00.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera
Reviews.Author: Mikelvi
Reviews.Content: great buy with an even greater price and I really do love it.  Just wished i could have afforded a dsl.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Sylverdollar "Sylverdollar"
Reviews.Content: Being a Nikon, I expected this to be an outstanding camera, however it was just mediocre. The price you just cannot beat. I do not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: nice quality camera

Reviews.Content: takes excellent pics , trusted name and easy to use - nice styling and appearance. zoom is awesome . buy it

Reviews.Title: Not reccomended
Reviews.Author: Nel
Reviews.Content: Substantial delay between pics half of them blurry unless in well lit area and using a tripod,battery holding tab does poor job of holding battery in place I would say you're better off with your cellphone camera.

Reviews.Title: super slim
Reviews.Author: S. Holland
Reviews.Content: I like that I can fit it in the smallest of my purses. It has a self timer which I really needed and it works great. I did not realize it came with a card so I bought an additional one, that is the only thing I would change, save my $ and use the one they include. It is super easy to use. I have yet to charge it and I take at least 1 picture a day usually with the flash, so far I am very happy with the battery life.

Reviews.Title: Handy
Reviews.Author: TERRY J. SMITH
Reviews.Content: Great in size. Compact. I am hopeful that I can figure out what I am doing in order to discontinue making blurry photographs.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 7x Zoom (Decorative Pink)
Reviews.Author: PAT
Reviews.Content: I received this camera in a very timely fashion.  It is so cute.  I can't tell how the picture quality is because it is a Christmas gift.  I think she will love it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Dawn Tower DuBois
Reviews.Content: Camera is horrible in low light situations.  Even when ISO set at 3200 images are out of focus.  Cheaply made as well.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, and features.
Reviews.Author: L. A. Storm
Reviews.Content: This is a very slim camera, which fits well in my purse. I had another coolpixthat got in the way of my new kitty, and ended up broken on the floor. So Iordered this one to replace it. I love it. Also, the feature I like the most, is beingable to touch the screen on the back of the camera to enhance the photo.I have been a long time fan of Nikon, but had purchased several digitalcameras from Olympus. The coolpix is a better deal in many ways, includingthe picture card. (Much less than the one that fits olympus).The only thing I have found to be a problem for me, is trying to get actionphotos..it seems slow, but I need to check the speed, and read more beforeI blame the camera. I am very glad I purchased this.

Reviews.Title: Nikko Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Marnee Obendorf
Reviews.Content: This recent version is smaller than the previous one but easy to handle & seems to take good quality pictures.

Reviews.Title: Bought it and returned it
Reviews.Author: Sonali Suchismita Padhi
Reviews.Content: Got as a gift for somebody. But I returned it as pictures were not clear and no image stabilizing. For the expectation it very bad. I am not an expert but it's does not take an expert to know this is a bad camera.I got a cannon "canon 260 sx" which came with same price with Black friday deal.

Reviews.Title: Spotted photos
Reviews.Author: Kaye John
Reviews.Content: I have purchased Nikon products before and was happy with them.  This camera is a different story.  There are always spots on the pictures even after adjusting settings.  The pictures are usually blurry or odd colors from true subject.  Would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon coolpix
Reviews.Author: Barby Holifield
Reviews.Content: Easy to handle.small in size for easy storage fits in shirtpocket.Sharp images with several choices of pictures to choose from.

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX s3500
Reviews.Author: Mark Park
Reviews.Content: Very nice compact camera. The orange color keeps it unique. Nice pictures and features. Great price for a 20.1 MP camera.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Ginger Persinger
Reviews.Content: I haven't had the chance to use this product yet because it is a gift for my daughter, but very pleased with the shipping and order, it arrived very quickly.  Although I had a choice to add a memory card in which I did add in my cart, haven't received it and it doesn't even show that I ordered it, so a little disappointed with that, but overall, so far the shipping and seller of the camera itself was great.

Reviews.Title: Ok camera
Reviews.Author: jeffrey v.
Reviews.Content: Decent camera simple point and click does the same thing any cellphone would do these days but my dads old school n needed a Christmas present

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great value, easy to use
Reviews.Author: Karen Kever "karenemountains"
Reviews.Content: This is the newest version of a very easy point and shoot with excellent features. The price is brilliant for the quality of the camera and the features. And it comes in very nifty colors which makes it all the more fun... I had to have the orange!

Reviews.Title: Nikon S3500
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Ease of use,great pictures with lots of fun functions,Glamour retouch and more...keep it with me al the time while out and about

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: easy to get started taking picture and everything with the exception of a sim card is there. glad i made the purchase

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Andi
Reviews.Content: I love it! It's a great camera at a great price. It's very small, therefore easy to carry. Holds up well too.

Reviews.Title: Worth the Money...
Reviews.Author: Martea C.
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, it takes good clear pictures but it's a little slow between shots - not too bad though.  It came with everything I needed to start taking pictures except a memory card.  Great Zoom capability.  All around a good buy!

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures...
Reviews.Author: terie165
Reviews.Content: I had to return this camera. The pictures were very blurry. I own a slr Nikon that I love so I thought this little point n shoot would be good too, I was wrong! Had to find something else.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany M McCarter
Reviews.Content: This camera is worth so much more then it's price. It even photoshops the photos. Worth the price and the pictures are fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Great little handy point-and-shoot camera at a good price ...
Reviews.Author: scherfcom
Reviews.Content: For the money it's an excellent product. I also have the S3300 and it's great. Sure, to get the perfect image with great (enhanced) colors, cropping, white balance, etc., in order for display, etc. you will need to run images through a bit of editing software of course, ... but that's normal. Nikon is usually a bit on the "cool" side in color reproduction, so it's good to enhance an image a bit, but that's fun anyway. It's a handy little point and shoot camera and fits in most pockets of a pair of jeans or anywhere in the purse. Color combo of decorative pink is especially nice for a gal ... they love it.

Reviews.Title: I love this Nikon
Reviews.Author: terry
Reviews.Content: This camera does far more than I expected it to do.The images are super sharp,and the options on the camera leave nothing more to ask for.Whats more,my battery life is fantastic.I took hundreds pf photos,and many videos,and the battery meter hasn`t even budged yet.If you want a great camera at a great price,look no further.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money.  Very user friendly and worth the money
Reviews.Author: Lamar S. White
Reviews.Content: Great little camera.  Superior performance and user friendly.  This is the one everybody is getting. Nikon makes a very good camera

Reviews.Title: Great pics and compact
Reviews.Author: John Nelson
Reviews.Content: Takes great photos and it fits in my pocket.Just as nice as my P90, but 1/3rd the size (or smaller).Something you can keep handy no matter where you are.

Reviews.Title: Great all around camera
Reviews.Author: Joe Toland
Reviews.Content: Everything about it is good. I like the compact size and the 7X zoom. Get great pics without infringing on someones space. Good for none "set-up" shots!

Reviews.Title: This super little camera!
Reviews.Author: Albert Cantin
Reviews.Content: needed a newer camera, had an older Nikon that lost both batteries and this fit the bill very nicely. Works so well and even set-up on a huge tripod, and with the timer, made for some great Thanksgiving group photos!

Reviews.Title: Easy-peasy camera makes fabulous photos.
Reviews.Author: katherine key
Reviews.Content: This camera is so eay to use, even a kid could do it. The photos are so clear, even when using the zoom feature. This is a great buy.

Reviews.Title: nice camera, excellent delivery.  thank you
Reviews.Author: tarry celle
Reviews.Content: nice camera  It takes amazing photographs.  It is a great point and shoot.  I will use this as a back up to the bridge DSLR camera that  I have.  thanks

Reviews.Title: Very cute
Reviews.Author: Mistress Pauley Belle
Reviews.Content: Small, fits in purse easily and easy to use. The pictures are wonderful. It is pink, need I say more...Who would not want such a cute camera.

Reviews.Title: BEST LITTLE CAMERA IN THE WORLD!
Reviews.Author: April B. "LETHAL  FAN"
Reviews.Content: I just purchased this "adorable" little camera for an early "Christmas" present to myself and so far, I am VERY impressed with it! It is very user friendly right out of the box and the software that comes along with the package downloads to your computer quite easily. I have several SD cards ( you don't get one with the camera) to use because I have 2 other digital cameras. The internal space for the camera only allows 5 shots. My favorite camera to use is my OLYMPUS SZ which is a little larger than this one, however, it now has competition with the NIKON COOLPIX S3500! LOVE THIS CAMERA! It is so fun to use!

Reviews.Title: Love the color
Reviews.Author: Vickie W.
Reviews.Content: Like the color works great did not realize I had to buy a sim card to use camera.  you can only take three or four pic with out it.  Had to order separately.  I would recomment it  is light weight appears to be easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Terrific "Back Pocket" Camera
Reviews.Author: George W. Colombo
Reviews.Content: Can't quarrel with the value proposition for this camera. It takes terrific pictures and is relatively easy to use. The biggest annoyance (as noted in other reviews) is the amount of time it takes to process between pictures. That peccadillo aside, this is an outstanding "back pocket" camera that travels and performs quite well under most circumstances.

Reviews.Title: Best resolution for the price!
Reviews.Author: Jared Handspicker
Reviews.Content: Best for the price in resolution and camera quality. I had to replace one I had previously bought because a friend had dropped the other one with the lens open from about 10 feet. The camera, itself still worked, but the drop had damaged the shutter enough that it couldn't fully open or close.  This is definitely my go to camera for quick pics and carrying with me on trips.  WELL worth the minimal investment!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous pocket camera
Reviews.Author: L. Corey "Writer Gal49 artist and writer"
Reviews.Content: I have been using this camera for several months and love it. I like the high quality optics and the compactness of this little powerhouse. It was on sale, so I feel that I scored a great bargain.It took me a while to get used to using just the screen to frame a photo, rather than a view-finder. It's hard to properly focus and frame with this type of mini camera, but I find that I rarely need to edit or fix a photo. They come out clear and with bright colors, most of the time. I like the fact that I can slip this camera in my pocket or travel bag and go. There is no stupid lens cap to keep track of. Yea! I recommend the Coolpix to anyone, expert or beginner for good photographs.Note: The photo editing software has a steep learning curve. I gave up and kept using my Olympus Master photo editor, which is the best I have ever used -- simple, easy to navigate, and lets me save photos by name in folders I name.

Reviews.Title: This camera is great
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This camera is great!!!! Bought this for a NFL game I was attending and this camera did a great job. Love the panorama shot I took with it and this camera has a great zoom and overall quality.I would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good quality camera

Reviews.Title: Simple (and cute) point and shoot.
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: For those of us not capable of diving into the camera world whole-hardheartedly, this is a perfect camera. Does as you think it should.

Reviews.Title: My Nikon digital camera Coolpix S3500
Reviews.Author: June Nunes
Reviews.Content: Easy to take pictures with. Also very clear pictures. Carry it in my purse at all times. I enjoy it very much.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: ooakdolly
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is so easy to use and the options are easy to find in the menus. The pet portrait mode is really good. For the money it can't be beat - Great Product.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful and Easy to Use!
Reviews.Author: Valerie Oz
Reviews.Content: I have had Olympus, Canon and now Nikon...obviously, the technology gets better every time I get a new camera, but I love this one so far.  The "Scene" button helps you navigate effortlessly through daytime, night time, action shots, etc.  The menus are easy, I love the 7X Zoom (Took a fantastic picture of the crescent moon this evening as a test run and was very pleased.)  I don't plan on taking any award-winning snaps with this, but I think it's great!

Reviews.Title: Coolpix S3500
Reviews.Author: Lynne A. Dalby
Reviews.Content: Took so long to take the picture that you lost the shot.  Returned and looking for another small digital camera

Reviews.Title: it worked well
Reviews.Author: JAMES M GINTER
Reviews.Content: The Nikon Coolpix camera works quite well for the money I spent for it and am very happy with the results of my purchase

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Leslie K. Eisenhour
Reviews.Content: This camera is great.  I love the pictures that it takes.  I wish it was touch screen but no biggy.  I have been using it everyday.  I have had it for a week now and no problems.  I have been getting a lot of compliments on my pictures and how clear they are.

Reviews.Title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!! Ridiculously high quality pictures!
Reviews.Author: Adam M. Burrows "adam"
Reviews.Content: this camera takes FANTASTIC pictures! my only complaint is that the LCD does not show the pictures as clear as the really are, its a bit deceptive. but despite how they look on the LCD screen, the pictures are incredible! the camera is nice and small, the battery lasts plenty long enough, we bough an extra just in case anyway though. overall this camera is awesome! i just wish the screen showed the pictures in the high quality that they really are. WORTH EVERY PENNY! We LOVE it!

Reviews.Title: Don't pass this up...add a mini-tripod and amase yourself!!

Reviews.Content: I've taken some amazing photographs and I've had this little gem for about a week. Own a Konica-Minolta MAXXUM 5D DSLR and it's a wonderful camera but shoots in 7megapixels and weights nearly 2 pounds. This Coolpix is about 4oz and shoots in 20.1 MPIX.And it also shoots HD video. I'm having a BLAST. Take it out morning and night!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: This is my second Nikon CoolPix.  My first one lasted me for about 3 years of very rough treatment (wet, cold, hot, sand, grit) but finally bit the dust due to sand in the lens opening apparatus.  This one, the S3500, appears to be almost identical, except it has higher zoom, and has some picture processing capabilities the earlier model did not.  Overall, these are good point & shoot digital cameras.

Reviews.Title: great little camera
Reviews.Author: Viola Sommers
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter, she loves it! It is a very compact little thing, with lots of features! Even us others can't keep our hands off it! The color is really nice, not an ugly orange. Perfect for travel and for a second camera to have around the house!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Penny Ceballos
Reviews.Content: This camera is great for kids.  My 8 year old niece loves her first camera.  The camera takes very nice photos.

Reviews.Title: COOLPIXS3500
Reviews.Author: chlakeguy
Reviews.Content: Camera was just as advertised. Arrived when promised. Set up instructions were easy to follow. It was a good purchase.

Reviews.Title: High Quality for a lower price
Reviews.Author: Tanya Alvarez
Reviews.Content: I love the camera!!  I use it when we go out to see local bands.  The Video is very high quality and it's small enough to fit in your back pocket

Reviews.Title: very bad
Reviews.Author: Arlen S. Daza F "Arlensiu"
Reviews.Content: I am so dissapointed because my camera it's really beautiful, but it doesn't work. I spend 150$ to fix it, and still hving poblems. I am really sad because when I'd see my camera I was so excited about it... But now, I will never buy anything to this seller.. :(

Reviews.Title: Birthday
Reviews.Author: jakeegirl
Reviews.Content: I read the reviews on this camera and several others before I decided to buy. I bought it as a gift for Grandson and when we opened it the display was deeply scratched. It's was so disappointing because it was a gift and now it has to be returned and it just ruined the feeling of giving him a gift so he could use it immediately. Now we are waiting to hear about making the return. Amazon has always been great and this is why I make purchases through them. I will continue but will order way ahead in case I need time to return an item for a special occasion and have time to have it on that day. My grandson is disappointed but sometimes things happen

Reviews.Title: NICE CAMERA FOR A GREAT PRICE!
Reviews.Author: M.D.
Reviews.Content: I haven't used my camera to it's full potential however I really do like it so far.  The pictures are clear and color quality is very nice. There is a cool setting where you can take pictures in B&W;, Sephia, Vivid (just to name the few off the top of my head). I own a really nice Nikon but don't like lugging it around as it's a bit on the bigger side. I wanted something compact for casual use.  This camera is actually smaller than I expected but I still love the size. I  purchased the pink.Not sure about the complaints regarding blurry pics.  You can get blurry pics with the most expensive cameras.  It happens sometimes no matter how good you are at taking photos.  In any case, you won't be disappointed with this camera.

Reviews.Title: perfect for someone who wants an easy to use pocket optical zoom camera with "features" for "fun" situations
Reviews.Author: Beltway Rider
Reviews.Content: The Nikon CoolPix S3500 camera is a very good inexpensive camera designed for casual picture taking and vacation and party snapshots, using the zoom lens and all the image manipulation features and controls included.  It is perfect for someone who wants an easy to use pocket optical zoom camera with "features" for "fun" situations.  Learn how to use it and you will be pleased.-----------------------------------------------------------------------Why 4 stars?  Here is the story.1. For snapshots shared online and 4 x 6 and 5 x 7 prints, the images are very good.2. Macro images taken with a zoom lens "optically optimized for normal shooting distances, they [the lenses] produce somewhat below-optimum image quality at close-up distances - particularly edge softness due to curvature of field." (Search on this phrase for an interesting article on the subject.)3. When significantly magnified, images appears to be a "soft focus" or a little less than crystal clear.  This is due to "noise" caused by the 20 million pixels on a small sensor about the size of your pinky fingernail. The pixels are too small to collect enough light to totally overcome the inherent electron noise in the sensor chip.  This pixel count "overkill" requires the camera software to "smooth" the image, resulting in an image that is less than crystal clear under magnification.  Example: a small sensor with 10 megapixels will result in a clearer picture than the same sized sensor with 20 megapixels. (See the website with the article "The difference in megapixels: Does it matter and how many are enough?"How Many Megapixels Do You Really Need?")4. Learning when and how to use the few automatic focus options before taking important pictures is essential.  This camera (like any other camera) focuses sharply once the photographer understands how and when to use the various options.5. The camera needs an SD card with a speed rating of 6 or higher to shorten the time it takes for the camera to move the image file to the SD card.  Ditto for movies, which are quite good.  This will speed up the "shot-to-shot" time that has been noted as an issue.  I use a card with a speed rating of 10.6. Making the image file size one step smaller than the factory settings also speeds up the image transfer, without any noticeable loss of image clarity or fidelity.---------------------------------------------------------------------My Nikon S3500 Quality Problem and Warranty Repair ExperienceAfter reading all the mostly positive reviews and having other Nikon cameras, I bought this camera as a travel camera instead of my more expensive Canon Elph 310 HS cameras.  (Travel as in "If a pickpocket takes my camera or if I lose it or drop it in the river, it's not that expensive, so what ever.")I was surprised that the first photos weren't as sharp as the reviews led me to expect.  When I took it on a class field trip, our host took our group's picture.  I was on the far left, blurry and out of focus.To provide identification of the camera owner, I always take a a macro picture of my business card before we left on the trip.  It was very out of focus on the left.I contacted Nikon service, who requested a picture.  After trying a full camera reset, with the same results, she said send it to Nikon Warranty Service (which is done by Precision Camera in Enfield Connecticut, a contractor, not Nikon).  It took one week from the day USPS says Precision Camera received the camera to the day it appeared on the Precision Camera website as "Received". I had called after the USPS said they delivered it to them.  It took three days before someone apologetically returned my call and said they were working on it.I received the repaired camera several days later. The far left side of a Macro picture was much less blurry.  The right and left edges for non-macro pictures settings were now slightly "soft" focus, according to the Nikon customer service rep on the Nikon website.  (I discovered that the camera's "view the image" function works well with the zoom control so small areas of the image can be magnified just as one would do on a computer.)I strongly recommend that you test all the functions and review the image quality of this or any camera that you buy within one week of receipt.  If there are problems, you can quickly return it to Amazon (a superb company to do business with) for a refund or a replacement.  Otherwise, the warranty service is your only option.----------------------------------------------------------------------Here is how I took focus test pictures:1.  Using an 8 1/2 by 11 inch piece of graph paper (1/4 inch boxes), and placing a small 6" ruler on the paper, using natural sunlight through the window, I took several Macro test shots, ensuring that the image was completely on the graph paper.2.  For normal and zoom pictures, I took pictures of the front of a house with bricks.  I took pictures of the brick exterior wall (like giant graph paper).I viewed the pictures on my computer using magnification to look at the lines and edges to determine their clarity.

Reviews.Title: davismax riped me off
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: davismax is nothing but a rip off!!!!!! bought a camera almost 2 weeks ago. have a problem with it and they send nothing but bullcrap!!! they stole my money as far as i can see!!! they do nothing but lie.

Reviews.Title: It is really worth it's value
Reviews.Author: Kaushik Biswas
Reviews.Content: With this price tag, this is really worth. Capture good pictures and very easy to use. Charging through USB is also a very good feature.

Reviews.Title: Too complicated for a camera that is supposed to be practical
Reviews.Author: Ali Saglam
Reviews.Content: was expecting a better camera from Nikon but did not meet my expectations , the zoom either did not work or i did not know how to make it work.Too complicated for a compact digital camera...!!!!

Reviews.Title: Cell phone takes better pictures
Reviews.Author: Breanna McNabb
Reviews.Content: I will be returning this camera. I had it on the correct mode and came out blurry. I'm NOT impressed.

Reviews.Title: Not the video camera I was hoping for
Reviews.Author: melissa
Reviews.Content: Great little camera but disappointed to find out that one can only record a video to last no more than 29 minutes even with a memory card.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Cindy Roberts
Reviews.Content: Got this camera for my grandaughter and she loved it. I like how small and light it is.The picture quality is great and she has a blast making videos. So if you're looking for a easy to use camera this is the one!!!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Fran
Reviews.Content: nice compact camera, lots of features, Lithium battery is the way to go! it can be charged either on the computer or ac.

Reviews.Title: huge disappointment
Reviews.Author: Deirdre McHugh Butts
Reviews.Content: Extremely disappointed. All the pictures are blurry. I've tried different SD cards thinking that might be the problem. I bought this camera for a recent trip to Europe and it was totally useless. I ended up using my iPhone :( I should have gone with the Canon that was the same pricepoint. Huge mistake!!!

Reviews.Title: Stylish, Convenient Photographic Excellence
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Sue Larson "best-selling author"
Reviews.Content: Ever since I got my first Coolpix camera several years ago, I've realized the special joy of having a camera capable of recording high definition videos and photos everywhere I go. This is the camera I love to carry in a pocket or purse, and thanks to its gorgeous color and design, it's a welcome fashion accessory in addition to being extremely useful!I purchased this camera after dropping my older Coolpix camera while on vacation, and selected it because it is somewhat similar to my camera which was one of the first Coolpix cameras, without being too new and different. I like the way this Coolpix still has the familiar wheel of button controls where I can set the flash, close-up lens, date, time and so forth. I'm gradually learning my way around the newer features, many of which I'm still not fully up to speed with, such as utilizing special effects. I'm starting to enjoy how easy it is to switch from taking still shots to recording video, since it's no longer a matter of making menu selections, but rather simply involves hitting the record video button. The quality of videos and photos is the same excellent Nikon quality I've come to know and love.While some people may be put off by a delay in readiness when getting ready to take photos, I find for most purposes this camera is ready for action when needed. I love the way this S3500 includes stabilization, so when I used the zoom and took pictures of Mount Shasta out of the airplane window on a recent flight, my pictures were surprisingly sharp and clear.I haven't yet made much use of the touch screen on this S3500, as it's not one of the features I desired... but at some point I might get used to it. Truthfully, I have yet to try most of the fancy bells and whistles on this little point and shoot camera! It was so easy to start using right out of the box that I never did play the DVD movie it came with. I expect at some point I may get around to doing that, but I think it says a lot for good product design that this little camera is so easy to get up and running without instructions they're something you can do when you have time and inspiration for such things.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: This good for first time users. But I have had better cameras
Reviews.Author: Kamau Osborne
Reviews.Content: I have had other cameras and I must say that this camera is "ok". I will recommend this for first time  users who just want a camera that is simple to use. But for someone who has experience with cameras this one is a bit of a disappointment. The quality of pictures are great but my smartphone camera has more features than this one. The video length is disappointing.... I got no more that 5 - 10 mins of video on the highest setting and had to lower the video quality to get up to 30 mins. i have had other cameras from Sony and Fugi and I Nikon disappoints me here.

Reviews.Title: Great camera and very easy to use.
Reviews.Author: Elena U.
Reviews.Content: Great camera and very easy to use. Was able to take it on a trip without having to study a lengthy manual.

Reviews.Title: Nicon COOLPIX S3500
Reviews.Author: B. Lorraine Logan "Lorraine"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera and I like the color.  My husband said it was very good.  I, personally, have not used it yet.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Richard Miller
Reviews.Content: I purchased the S3500 as a replacement to my S3300  which a fiend dropped and broke.  This is my fourth Nikon Coolpix camera.  They take great pictures.  I always used a Cannon EOS until my wife received the Nikon as a gift.  The ease of use and compactness make it easy to carry when participating in activities.  I always buy the Square Trade warrantee and have never had any trouble getting a replacement when I damage the camera.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: lightspeed2121
Reviews.Content: I sent this camera to my little old mom  because Im pretty sure she will be able to use it,,,it's simple

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: Elsa Gant

I tried to buy it in Office Depot, unfortunately, the Office Depot asked me to get one in their another store because the store had only one on the counter that couldn't sale.  So, I bought it on Amazon.com with better deal come with the memory card that even cheaper than the camera only  in Office Depot.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: jim merwin
Reviews.Content: Just what I wanted for travel, light weight, easy to use point and shoot. Will take to Italy nest month.

Reviews.Title: Cute and compact
Reviews.Author: Photo Princess "Jennie"
Reviews.Content: This little camera is great! I bought as a gift and it's all as advertised. I suggest this camera for a person with medium to small hands it is very compact! It would be a great gift for a starter for a child.

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: vincent
Reviews.Content: Camera did a great job on normal situation picutres, however dosen't have enough flexibility or features  to get tougher shots.

Reviews.Title: Not great
Reviews.Author: meramigone
Reviews.Content: Not a great camera. Ok during daytime but nighttime pictures are blurry, out of focus. Easy to use, small, light, ok for it's price but I would not buy it again, nor recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice little Camera.
Reviews.Author: Carol Loar
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these cameras for Christmas gifts. I have not used them, but have opened them and inspected the camera. They appear to be a high quality camera at a great price. I own a Nikon D3000 and wouldn't mind having one of these in my pocket! Loved it.

Reviews.Title: Gift for Granddaughter
Reviews.Author: Knitting Addict "Emily"
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get this to encourage my granddaughter's interest in photography.  The icing on the cake is...it's PURPLE!  Actually, I like the camera and might consider getting one for myself (not purple, though!)

Reviews.Title: purchased as a gift
Reviews.Author: Connie Self
Reviews.Content: He loved it.  compact in size, easy to carry and operate,  and great bright pictures.  Would definitely recommend the product.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Kathryn Hingst
Reviews.Content: have not had a real chance to use the camera, but seems like it will be easy to grasp all the options it offers

Reviews.Title: Our new Nikon CoolPix
Reviews.Author: Joyce Herzog, author speaker
Reviews.Content: is amazing. My husband has been reading and learning all the things it can do. He loves the many features it has. I love that I can "point and shoot" and not have to know - or care - about all the wonderful things it can do! We're both happy with theproduct - especially at the price! Good bargain.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: BLKDRGN
Reviews.Content: I got this for my daughter's and it works. I wished the button were a little bigger but I can't complain for the price. The colors were perfect as they love purple and pink. Pictures comes out clear and the camera is light.

Reviews.Title: Love this little camera..
Reviews.Author: Big Sky 77
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this little camera.. Love the size and ease of use. Takes the best indoor pics of any p&S; I have owed (that has been quite a few).......... of course .. great outdoors as well.. This camera is the true definiation of a point and shoot..

Reviews.Title: excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Nissa c
Reviews.Content: This delivery was very quick, and the package good size etc. Camera looks lovely but more importantly, takes high quality shots for a point and shoot! Definitely a steal at this price. So decent my husband actually prefers using this for his boudoir photography shoots.

Reviews.Title: Not happy
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: I think this camera is all about design. its functions are limited and the picture quality is not satisfactory. I am disappointed as this is a Nikon supposed to be the best?????

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my wife.
Reviews.Author: Sonoguy
Reviews.Content: Works great and my wife loves it. Good birthday gift. The pics are crisp and clear and the auto setting is great for most pics.

Reviews.Title: Nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Lindra
Reviews.Content: This camera is takes awesome pictures and ordered the batteries, charger and other items very cheaply.  Love it and purple is my favorite color.  Prompt delivery and very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX is Cool
Reviews.Author: Doris Gentilman
Reviews.Content: This camera was a birthday gift and my daughter loved it.  Perfect size for traveling since it fits right in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: like
Reviews.Author: s alley
Reviews.Content: Hi i like this camera it is easy to work i got it on time and the pictures look great

Reviews.Title: Nikon review
Reviews.Author: eileen
Reviews.Content: Had a Nikon previously is why I selected this model. The on button is small as are the other buttons. My other one apparently was dropped and couldn't be fixed which makes me a little nervous about this one. Haven't developed any pictures yet , hoping for the best. Liked the price !

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX is Just KOOL !!
Reviews.Author: Subbu
Reviews.Content: What an amazing picture clarity and I use it soo much on the go. I will buy another one to gift it to some one special !!!

Reviews.Title: This was a Christmas gift to me
Reviews.Author: Micky R
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use the camera.  Really enjoying using this camera.  Has a lot of really neat features and I plan on learning to use them all.

Reviews.Title: good camera wrong color
Reviews.Author: dgreiner
Reviews.Content: I ordered a different color than I reieved but the camera is great. Would have liked the purple I ordered for my grandaughter

Reviews.Title: Nikon S3500
Reviews.Author: BK
Reviews.Content: Purchased this product for a relative.  Have had no personal experience with the unit.Being familiar with Nikon photo products I'm sure it is good.

Reviews.Title: a PURPLE camera!
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Fuller
Reviews.Content: I chose this Nikon COOLPIX S3500 20.1 MP - because of the high number of megapixels.. and because I REALLY liked the purple color.

Reviews.Title: whats this
Reviews.Author: wesley wilson
Reviews.Content: I havnt received my camera case yet.I was wondering when I could expect it.only thing I dont like about it was, its very small.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: Priscilla Christopher
Reviews.Content: It is a small compact camera. The operation appears to be quite easy.Very disappointed there was no memory card for the camera. Had to order separately.

Reviews.Title: Better than what she wanted
Reviews.Author: Thomas P. Haikin
Reviews.Content: Our oldest granddaughter wanted a Nikon camera for Christmas and we found this one on-line. It's a better model for less money than the one she found surfing the Internet in other places.

Reviews.Title: Regular
Reviews.Author: Mario Ayapal Lopez Cruz
Reviews.Content: The camera is not as good.Programs for use are complicated.I like its compact size.No one recommended product

Reviews.Title: Satisfied!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I'm only giving this camera a 4 because I just received it today. First, it's purple! Secondly, for the pictures I've taken so far.. I am impressed! I wanted a camera that I could pack around for everyday use. This camera is perfect for just that and the pictures are clearer than the camera a cousin of mine has used to take pictures for me. I already love it so, I hope it doesn't fail me!

Reviews.Title: Great purchase for the avid photographer who wants something small and effective.
Reviews.Author: Angie from Chicago
Reviews.Content: I keep the camera in my pursue and I'm able to take shots while on the go. The pictures are very clear and the video is great! Able to download and send anywhere and anytime. Better because I do not have to carry larger video camcorder or large Canon camera.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Karen O "uffdaostr"
Reviews.Content: I like the size and of course the color.  Just got it in the mail today.  Really fast service as always.  Can't seem to get it registered though.  I have tried 3 times.

Reviews.Title: 2 1/2 months - dead
Reviews.Author: RyanLeej
Reviews.Content: I treated this camera with far better caution than any other one I've ever had and this one lasted the shortest amount of time (2.5 months).It fell out of my pocket in the elevator, since then it hasn't worked at all.  So I can't really derive a whole lot other than this is an exceptionally delicate camera.I doubt I'll ever look at getting a Nikon ever again.  I know there are shock absorbing models, but damn...  dropped once from the pocket and it's done for. :/Camera-wise, I'm kind of relieved (in a way) because the camera on my phone seems to always produce better photos.

Reviews.Title: Did not receive
Reviews.Author: David Johnston
Reviews.Content: The camera was supposed to come as a package deal with a camera case and SD card.  There was no case included in the shipment.

Reviews.Title: missing items
Reviews.Author: Diane Bowen
Reviews.Content: The camera works fine however it would have been nice to have received the manual and the needed cords that were shown in the info

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix
Reviews.Author: Dogman "Thor"
Reviews.Content: This is my second coolpix by Nikon.  The first gave me great photos all over Europe and Canada.  It finally started "acting up" and I bought this one which is almost the same camera to replace the old one.

Reviews.Title: happy wife, happy life!!!
Reviews.Author: domingo morin
Reviews.Content: Title should say it all, so all good in my world, she absolutely loves it as she used to have one awhile back that broke on her...

Reviews.Title: Didn't met expecation of the specification of  20.1 megapixel, my iphone 5 mp pics are much more better that this 20.1 mp.
Reviews.Author: Satish Chillappagari
Reviews.Content: Didn't met expecation of the specification of  20.1 megapixel, my iphone 5 mp pics are much more better that this 20.1 mp.

Reviews.Title: not easy
Reviews.Author: Suzi Reading
Reviews.Content: Having some difficulty with the Coolpix .Not being able to upload photos and it is not easy to operate not satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: wrong camera
Reviews.Author: rebecca
Reviews.Content: i ordered this by mistake. the person i ordered it as a gift and found out it was the wrong one.

Reviews.Title: I didn't like this camera
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: I followed the instructions, but couldn't do the one thing I especially bought the camera for, and that is to transfer pictures of my grandchild to my computer to share.  I became ill before I had a chance to return the camera so I am stuck with it.  Perhaps I can find someone else who would like it and I'll give it to them.

Reviews.Title: not a touch screen
Reviews.Author: scorn
Reviews.Content: Great camera but my last nikon had a touch screen and this one does not so it seems likeits an older model. However, my touchscreen one gave out very fast so I am glad this one is not a touchscreen.

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix S3500
Reviews.Author: LaVonn Russell
Reviews.Content: Have not actually used it..  It seems OK, Much the same as the last camera I had, which I actually did not like although the photos were satisfactory.  I am going to Paris and traveling France soon.  Those pictures will be the test.  LaVonn Russell

Reviews.Title: One bump and done and warranty voided!
Reviews.Author: Donna Hoffman
Reviews.Content: For the time I was able to use the camera, it seemed to do all I expected it to do.  I used it for about a week and it sustained a bump.  It was enough to chip the finish, but I was really shocked that it took no more than that to finish it off.  To my amazement, it would never turn on, again.  I could have lied about how the chip in the finish happened, but I was truthful and told them that it had sustained an impact, but I didn't think it should have been enough to break the camera.  Their response was that the warranty was voided and an estimate that was about $10. more than I paid for the camera.  A brand new camera and they couldn't compromise the least little bit.  When I buy another, it will not be a Nikon.

Reviews.Title: Does not come with rechargeable battery
Reviews.Author: Jessica winder
Reviews.Content: Not a good quality camera and does not come with a rechargeable battery. Would not recommend this camera at all.

Reviews.Title: Failed after less than two years of light use
Reviews.Author: M. Powers "Matt"
Reviews.Content: The older model of this Nikon Coolpix failed in less than two years of light use.  LCD screen became unusable.

Reviews.Title: sucks
Reviews.Author: Andrea K Mitchell
Reviews.Content: I was excited to get this camera... but when i got it i put in my SD card and was taking pictures... i went to view my pictures and the screen kept going black and wouldnt let me view anything... i tried taking the battery out and and putting it back in but it still didnt work.. i hate this camera and is very upset.. not worth the money at all

Reviews.Title: nikon coolpix camera..
Reviews.Author: pamela breedlove
Reviews.Content: i just wish i could get it..... it is for my grandaughter for graduation gift.. witch is coming up next weekend ... i just really hope that it gets here on time....

Reviews.Title: Cute
Reviews.Author: Doug Mulder
Reviews.Content: The design was really cute.  Haven't used it yet though.  I totally would consider buying this, maybe.  I like the design.
